Name: UserAccount
Comment: Properties used to create a user on an Azure Batch node.

Key.Name: Name
Key.SummaryComment: The name of the user account.

Key.Name: ElevationLevel
Key.SummaryComment: The elevation level of the user account.
Key.RemarksComment: If omitted, the default is <see cref="Common.ElevationLevel.NonAdmin"/>

Key.Name: Password
Key.SummaryComment: The password for the user account.

Key.Name: SshPrivateKey
Key.SummaryComment: The SSH private key for the user account.
Key.RemarksComment: The SSH private key establishes password-less SSH between nodes in a Linux pool when the pool's <see cref="CloudPool.InterComputeNodeCommunicationEnabled"/> property is true. This property will be ignored in a Windows pool.
